item.title: How much did no fans affect the 2020 MLS season?
item.description: Soccer fans around the world know how much the crowd can get in the head of an opposing player, put a team off their game, or just be supportive to the home team for 90 minutes. As far as we can remember, this has been the case, but in 2020, our reality changed. The 2020 MLS season played the majority of its games without fans, and even when there were fans it wasnâ€™t very many.

item.title: College Football 2020 Test Libraries
item.description: Not every team is able to win games in college football, and for some teams, they lose a lot of games. Some of those games they lose by a lot of points as well. I want to take a look at what games were the most one sided. library(tidyverse) ## -- Attaching packages --------------------------------------- tidyverse 1.3.0 -- ## v ggplot2 3.3.3 v purrr 0.3.4 ## v tibble 3.0.5 v dplyr 1.
